page.title: 17Portobello Estate
page.content: This is a housing estate mainly of { {Council houses,}but some houses have been bought from the Council by the occupiers. Amenities are very few, only 4 shops and a Public House, but Wakefield town centre is not far away. Most estate children attend{Manygates {Middle School.}The nearby Grove Park had a children's playground and an old folks' shelter, but these were destroyed by{vandals. Near to the estate is the public area of{Sandal Castle.}The Castle ruins are partly buried to preserve them for archaeological purposes. The site attracts many visitors who can see the site of the{Battle of Wakefield}fought in 1460. Very near to the Castle is {Sandal {Endowed Middle School. }
